about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: Passionate about Data Science and Artificial Intelligence, I am currently pursuing a Master’s degree in AI at EPSI Paris. My academic background has allowed me to develop strong skills in Machine Learning and MLOps.
about.paragraph2: I am able to design data pipelines, perform preprocessing, run statistical tests, and deploy models into production. My tech stack includes Python, SQL, Scikit-learn, Streamlit, GCP, and more.
about.paragraph3: I am looking for an apprenticeship for my Master 2 starting in September 2026, where I can apply my skills, contribute to innovative data projects, and continue to grow professionally.
about.objectiveText: To become a Data Science expert capable of designing, developing, and deploying Machine Learning solutions that create business value.
